ICPrinter Initialization

Detailed Description

Steps in order to initialize an ICPrinter object.

To get the printer channel ready, do as following:

  • Point to the shared instance by calling sharedPrinter (ICPrinter)
  • Set the printerDelegate property to and object that implements the ICISMPDeviceDelegate and ICPrinterDelegate protocols.
  • Check the isAvailable property to see if the connection has been properly established to the Companion and the printer channel opened

Function Documentation

+ (id) sharedPrinter

Returns the unique shared instance of ICPrinter.

This method returns an autoreleased object.

Returns
A pointer to the shared instance

Properties

- (id<ICISMPDeviceDelegate,ICPrinterDelegate>) delegate
readwritenonatomicassign

The delegate object that should implement the ICPrinterDelegate protocol.

By implementing the protocol, the delegate is notified with ICPrinter's events
